channel.title: Mining Performance on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Mining Performance on FinanClub

item.title: MARA
item.description: score:1079 Chances: Marathon Digital Holdings reported mining a record 179 blocks in July 2023 and produced 1,176 BTC, showcasing strong operational performance. The company’s increased operational and installed hash rate contributed to its significant Bitcoin production and accumulation. Marathon’s strategic joint venture in Abu Dhabi began mining operations and produced 17 BTC in July.
